channel.title: Qidan's Notes on
channel.description: Recent content in Qidan's Notes on

item.description: AKA Malevolence Daria ’s weapon. Usually surrounded by maddening mists of red.
About The start of all adventures Events Attacked by Canus from The Syndicate Birth place of the Cradle Snatchers
City Of The Elves

About Bordered by a ravine. Wolfkin and Mousekin claim the country was the invaded by something. The undead? A vengeful paladin? But the Wolfkin are fighting to get the country back Incredibly Dark City Unknown name Run by The Marquis Events Wolfkin Attack

Churches Large Church to the Eldath in the center of a farming town Taverns The Boil and Youth Locations Badger Hill Cute little hillside with a taxidermy badger outside owner is Percival Events Hostage situation of the Church Trapped on Badger Hill
“FORESTY”
About Technological City. High poverty line contains slums. Events Find Breeze and their sister provide them with healing

About Gem of Aeresia Main market district of the continent Taverns The Golden Lion Posh Charity is the bartender They have coconut rum from Rauthei from a rabbit kin Events Ellianas was kidnapped by Granny Met Raffles the talking weasle
About Home of the rabbit kin

About The home of the Cradle Snatchers Members at the stronghold Percival Pink Panther Geralt of Rivania Corellien Merryweather Ratkin [[People/NPC/Cosine]] Creatures at the stronghold Pandalope called miss pandalopez Sharkpup called Hamilton Hellhound called Cheesecake Pig cocktail shaker
Locations Tarvern of Forever Aeresia Stronghold Cradle Elunore Ghost Innadel Leradel Mitz Ofheise Rauthei
A between releam bar which have connections to all parts of the multiverse.
Best Adventures ever…. NO QUESTION Active Members: Qidan Daria Winter Archibald Inactive Members: Mardred Blutgard Geralt of Rivania Blue Sigma Naberus Mouse?
Through out the time the Cradle Snatchers has existed they have been climatic moments where a a Character uses a Granade. We have seen this with: [[People/NPC/Pigwings]]
Organisations Cradle Snatchers The Syndicate Octopus Tattoo Granade Users

A smiling Octopus Tattoo of initially found on the bodies of some hired mercenaries in Innadel . Later it was discovered that Winter also has the same tattoo on their back. Winter Quotes “We were a family” “I just went North to do some recon” Innadel - A number of lads travelling through has a octopus tattoo

About Members of The Syndicate are mostly Rakshasa (they have there hands on backwards and are tiger deamons). They all worship [[Lady Ravana]] Members Canus - Dead Lady Xiao Lord Itcis - Dead The Senishal Tigris Lord Capra Lord Bovi Sir Equis The Marquis Madame Porcus ??? ??? ??? Associates of The Syndicate Saraki - Dead Rillathane - Dead Breeze
https://forgottenrealms.fandom.com/wiki/Eldath
About The face of The Syndicate AKA “The Lady of the long night” The puppet queen Mystress of Shadows Malice General Bad-bitch The Raven Queen(?) Events
https://forgottenrealms.fandom.com/wiki/Lathander
Mardred Blutgard

About Race: Kitsune Apparel: Black Armour Weapons: Silver Bow From: Mitz “The best courier in all the north” Events Breeze was used by the syndicate to trap the Cradle Snatchers for payment for their ill sister’s treatment.
About Dead like anus - Qidan
About Avatar of the god of magic. Located at Stronghold - Master of secrets. Has died and been ressurected. Events Killed by Rillathane Used to love Rillathane
About Mech from the mech releam former Pirate of the Astral Sea

About Little Wolf kin / Fully grown wolfkin due to a time crystal and branching paths. Events Last seen by the party when he travelled back in time to see his father. He then broke the one rule that he stayed behind and basically broke the whole of Space and Time. But that wont come back to bite us… There are now two Fangs, Old Fang who went back in time and a Fang which decided not to go back in time.
“Insemination in the Ranks” About Lead the attack on Ghost against The Marquis . Aggressive but pat-able
About Leader of a Hag coven of three (all bar one is dead name to be confirmed) Geralt of Rivania used to be a servant of Granny Dead

NPCs Breeze Canus Corellien Cosine Fang Granny General Howlington La Qua Lady Xiao Lord Bovi Lord Itcis Merryweather Murray Destroyer of Worlds Percival Pibbles Pink Panther Portobello Pete Ratkin Rillathane Saraki The Matron The Marquis
About DEAD - Badger Hill by Archibald BUT BUT BUT WHAT ABOUT THE MANNERISMS

About Member of The Syndicate Has a a tail which is long and thin and can pick up items like a monkey Events Trapped us at badger hill We have to sneakily get into her mansion Other Archibald has a connection to her (hit list?)
About Member of The Syndicate Minotaur Lord of the Hylyllian Empire
About Unknown!
About Our Quest Giver. Loves Corellien

About A talking skull met at Ghost now worn on winters belt “Evil in the sense that he is undead but not actually evil” Died at a dark elven war. (unsure if true) Says he is Human king (This is a lie) There was no Human King called Murray. Questions Who is Murray?
About Owner of Badger Hill Pug boy Caretaker of Griffins New member of the Stronghold

About Fey Creature - Adorable Appearance Hedgehog-kin in a suit and usually in a position requiring the parties help Events Feyrealm an escort mission with a group of hedgehogs to a local village and defended them against some blink dogs. The party then gave Pibbles alot of gold and suggested him to the local Authority that a life of politics may suit him. For which he ditched his counterparts (It’s ok they robbed the party after in the Hedgeshot) Water realm, Pibbles is now the advisor to a Fayreleam’s diplomat, who under the control of a mind flayer murders them with cold blood.

About Met in the plane of insanity Had a dead cat, bat, camel and fish as a pet Dead Events Used a grande to kill a member of the royalty with in the plane of insantiy Documents came to light that Pigwings was a secret agent man (more clarity needed)
About Butler of the Stronghold usually accompained by the Pink Panther theme. Totally bad ass in combat.
About Mushoom being. Used to hang around corpses of dark rituals Best Friend of Qidan . Likely a stoner vision or imaginary friend. Probably not real…
About I think they are dead lol
About Member of The Syndicate Avatar of Nature Dead - Killed by the Cradle Snatchers
About Lord of the Dark Elves. Dead Member of The Syndicate Events Caused a massive rift bringing deamons and nightmare fuel into Elunore when a vote for War on Cradle
About Member of The Syndicate Has a beak but not Arrakoa Can control animals Is a Rackshasa Resides with in the capital city of Ghost
About [[Fang]]’s Mother. Banged by Naberus
About Has a tattoo of a octopus with 8 guns on his butt
About Kenku Bard. Now works in the Tarvern of Forever
About MIA
About Killed by Granny
About A Orc Blood Hunter now Military Advisor for the Cradle Snatchers
About Hill Dwarf Barbarian. Asended to a god after a trail infront of the Dwarven Gods.
About MIA

About Class - Spore Druid From - Ofheise Backstory: Part of a drudic clan which resided in the forests northwest of Ofheise was cast out for being lazy and focused on the darker parts of druidic craft focusing on spores and decay instead of life and rejuvenation. Qidan was cast out at 14 left as a Lonely teenage firbolg outside the city of the elves. Qidan was picked up/hoodwinked by Saraki and used to dispose of bodies of failed rituals for Lolth .
About Little Fox boyo

Session 1 Innadel or Leradel Arrived at Innadel Met Breeze Went to the local tavern and question Breeze who was suspicious Archie notices guards outside the church Qidan scouts as a Bat We go and investigate FOR NO REASON EXCEPT NOSY Hostage situation Big fight Find letter with Black Seal with a monkey on From The Syndicate initiating the church into the fold Told to meet at Badger Hill Go to Badger Hill Get trapped by Lady Xiao CLIFFHANGER

Session 2 Badger Hill mages start filling the holes with CloudKill Rescue the hippogriffs and Percival moonfluff beaky prometheus cloudfleather Big battle on Badger Hill On the bodies found necklace diamond shape green gem in the center used for spell channeling. Archibald maims La Qua La Qua I am just following orders “You were asking questions about where she is from” RE: Lady Xiao If you take me with you I will get you into her Mansion We kill him

Session 3 Fang - used crystal, lasted for a week, but wolfkin had gone when he had got back Reigning lady of Mitts High tea society fleeing - covered in dust - to the south Ghost rebellion - mousekin and wolfkin kicked out - attempting to retake the city. An army (all) led by General Howlington I ARRIVED LATE Travelling to Ofheise On travelling we view a tear caused by the multi fang Fangs mom is at Ghost ready to attack Qidan dreams of a woman (believed to be Lady Ravana ) in all red who attempts to attack him Arrive at Ofheise Buys some shoes Go to the local tavern to find out about Lady Xiao Talks about Rauthei and a delivery from a rabbit person Archi got a tattoo Went to the stables Daria made the stable boy Qidan made friends with the horse Horse info - Lady Xiao has a a tail which is long and thin and can pick up items Fight on the bridge against zombies Met Murray Destroyer of Worlds which can talk

Session 4 Questioning Murray Destroyer of Worlds Attacked by Zombie lake boys Daria turns into a red mist after nearly dying mainly to friendly fire “you are in my domain” - CROW AND RAT unsure if they are in the same voice A wall of flesh fight Met a Wolfkin fighting, he said he can lead us to The Matron Daria intimidated Rico who is a Wolfkin warrior Met General Howlington Older Fang has a big EGO and has headed to fight The Marquis against the General’s orders

item.title: Dominus Oraculum
item.description: Book made out of human flesh found by Naberus One shall come and 3 shall hide and all dwarves shall kneel when she does arise._ Beware the fox of pure intention, you will be betrayed. Though he knows not the darkness his actions serve._ The wolf shall return and with him rip the realm atwain. Two must become one or else one shall become two.

item.description: List of Memes Sexy Ham. Illusion used by a legendary hedgehog bard to distract animals. “Does a x hit” - Used by Geralt of Rivania whenever he rolled a “2” and it came out as 30 to hit. But but but what about the accent
